item.description:
8/15/10
Mark Twain is still such a contemporary public figure
That he was on the cover of Newsweek, August 9, 2010 issue.
I have not had a chance to read the articles yet.

Who wants to take a tour of the Mark Twain House & Museum?

http://www.marktwainh...

www.marktwainhouse.org/

Is the Mark Twain House really Haunted?
Remember, this is a tour, not an investigation.
Though some of us might sense something from
a common tour.

We can talk about car pooling if you are interested in going.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes and Maybe.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Searchs the Mark Twain's House
